verses.text: And it came to pass in the \w eleventh|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w*, in the \w third|strong="H7992"\w* \add month\add*, in the \w first|strong="H0259"\w* \add day\add* of the \w month|strong="H2320"\w*, \add that\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*,

\w Son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w man|strong="H0120"\w*, \w speak|strong="H0559"\w* unto \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Egypt|strong="H4714"\w*, and to his \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*; Whom art thou \w like|strong="H1819"\w* in thy \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*?

¶ Behold, the \w Assyrian|strong="H0804"\w* \add was\add* a \w cedar|strong="H0730"\w* in \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* with \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* \w branches|strong="H6057"\w*, and with a \w shadowing|strong="H6751"\w* \w shroud|strong="H2793"\w*, and of an \w high|strong="H1362"\w* \w stature|strong="H6967"\w*; and his \w top|strong="H6788"\w* was among the thick \w boughs|strong="H5688"\w*.\f + \fr 31.3 \ft with fair branches: Heb. fair of branches\f*

The \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* made him \w great|strong="H1431"\w*, the \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* set him up on \w high|strong="H7311"\w* with her \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w* \w running|strong="H1980"\w* round \w about|strong="H5439"\w* his \w plants|strong="H4302"\w*, and sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* her little \w rivers|strong="H8585"\w* unto all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*.\f + \fr 31.4 \ft made…: or, nourished him\f*\f + \fr 31.4 \ft set…: or, brought him up\f*\f + \fr 31.4 \ft little rivers: or, conduits\f*

Therefore his \w height|strong="H6967"\w* was \w exalted|strong="H1361"\w* above all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w*, and his \w boughs|strong="H5634"\w* were \w multiplied|strong="H7235"\w*, and his \w branches|strong="H6288"\w* became \w long|strong="H0748"\w* because of the \w multitude|strong="H7227"\w* of \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, when he shot \w forth|strong="H7971"\w*.\f + \fr 31.5 \ft when…: or, when it sent them forth\f*

All the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* made their \w nests|strong="H7077"\w* in his \w boughs|strong="H5589"\w*, and under his \w branches|strong="H6288"\w* did all the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* bring forth their \w young|strong="H3205"\w*, and under his \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* all \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*.

Thus was he \w fair|strong="H3302"\w* in his \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w*, in the \w length|strong="H0753"\w* of his \w branches|strong="H1808"\w*: for his \w root|strong="H8328"\w* was by \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.

The \w cedars|strong="H0730"\w* in the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* could not \w hide|strong="H6004"\w* him: the fir \w trees|strong="H1265"\w* were not \w like|strong="H1819"\w* his \w boughs|strong="H5589"\w*, and the chesnut \w trees|strong="H6196"\w* were not like his \w branches|strong="H6288"\w*; nor any \w tree|strong="H6086"\w* in the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w* was \w like|strong="H1819"\w* unto him in his \w beauty|strong="H3308"\w*.

I have \w made|strong="H6213"\w* him \w fair|strong="H3303"\w* by the \w multitude|strong="H7230"\w* of his \w branches|strong="H1808"\w*: so that all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*, that \add were\add* in the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* of \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w envied|strong="H7065"\w* him.

¶ Therefore thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Because thou hast lifted \w up|strong="H1361"\w* thyself in \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, and he hath shot \w up|strong="H5414"\w* his \w top|strong="H6788"\w* among the thick \w boughs|strong="H5688"\w*, and his \w heart|strong="H3824"\w* is lifted \w up|strong="H7311"\w* in his \w height|strong="H1363"\w*;

I have therefore \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* him into the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of the mighty \w one|strong="H0410"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*; he shall \w surely|strong="H6213"\w* \w deal|strong="H6213"\w* with him: I have driven him \w out|strong="H1644"\w* for his \w wickedness|strong="H7562"\w*.\f + \fr 31.11 \ft he…: Heb. in doing he shall do unto him\f*

And \w strangers|strong="H2114"\w*, the \w terrible|strong="H6184"\w* of the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, have cut him \w off|strong="H3772"\w*, and have \w left|strong="H5203"\w* him: upon the \w mountains|strong="H2022"\w* and in all the \w valleys|strong="H1516"\w* his \w branches|strong="H1808"\w* are \w fallen|strong="H5307"\w*, and his \w boughs|strong="H6288"\w* are \w broken|strong="H7665"\w* by all the \w rivers|strong="H0650"\w* of the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*; and all the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* are gone \w down|strong="H3381"\w* from his \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w*, and have \w left|strong="H5203"\w* him.

Upon his \w ruin|strong="H4658"\w* shall all the \w fowls|strong="H5775"\w* of the \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w remain|strong="H7931"\w*, and all the \w beasts|strong="H2416"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* shall be upon his \w branches|strong="H6288"\w*:

To the end that none of all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* by the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w exalt|strong="H1361"\w* themselves for their \w height|strong="H6967"\w*, neither shoot \w up|strong="H5414"\w* their \w top|strong="H6788"\w* among the thick \w boughs|strong="H5688"\w*, neither their \w trees|strong="H0352"\w* stand \w up|strong="H5975"\w* in their \w height|strong="H1363"\w*, all that \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*: for they are all \w delivered|strong="H5414"\w* unto \w death|strong="H4194"\w*, to the nether \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*, in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of \w men|strong="H0120"\w*, with them that go \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*.\f + \fr 31.14 \ft their trees…: or, stand upon themselves for their height\f*

Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; In the \w day|strong="H3117"\w* when he went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to the \w grave|strong="H7585"\w* I caused a \w mourning|strong="H0056"\w*: I \w covered|strong="H3680"\w* the \w deep|strong="H8415"\w* for him, and I \w restrained|strong="H4513"\w* the \w floods|strong="H5104"\w* thereof, and the \w great|strong="H7227"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* were \w stayed|strong="H3607"\w*: and I caused \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w* to \w mourn|strong="H6937"\w* for him, and all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w fainted|strong="H5969"\w* for him.\f + \fr 31.15 \ft to mourn: Heb. to be black\f*

I made the \w nations|strong="H1471"\w* to \w shake|strong="H7493"\w* at the \w sound|strong="H6963"\w* of his \w fall|strong="H4658"\w*, when I cast him \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* with them that \w descend|strong="H3381"\w* into the \w pit|strong="H0953"\w*: and all the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*, the \w choice|strong="H4005"\w* and \w best|strong="H2896"\w* of \w Lebanon|strong="H3844"\w*, all that \w drink|strong="H8354"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, shall be \w comforted|strong="H5162"\w* in the nether \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

They also went \w down|strong="H3381"\w* into \w hell|strong="H7585"\w* with him unto \add them that be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* with the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*; and \add they that were\add* his \w arm|strong="H2220"\w*, \add that\add* \w dwelt|strong="H3427"\w* under his \w shadow|strong="H6738"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w heathen|strong="H1471"\w*.

¶ To whom art thou thus \w like|strong="H1819"\w* in \w glory|strong="H3519"\w* and in \w greatness|strong="H1433"\w* among the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w*? yet shalt thou be brought \w down|strong="H3381"\w* with the \w trees|strong="H6086"\w* of \w Eden|strong="H5731"\w* unto the nether \w parts|strong="H8482"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: thou shalt \w lie|strong="H7901"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* of the \w uncircumcised|strong="H6189"\w* with \add them that be\add* \w slain|strong="H2491"\w* by the \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*. This \add is\add* \w Pharaoh|strong="H6547"\w* and all his \w multitude|strong="H1995"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the \w Lord|strong="H0136"\w* \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.
